Lord of Ironrath0285696kvbv7mlbcjal3138eyh21s9e12pv3k1721682015-02-08T15:28:52ZThe Dragon Demands5014364[[File:Ironrath.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Ironrath]]: Seat of the Lord of Ironrath.]]
'''Lord of the Ironrath''' is a title held by the ruler of the castle [[Ironrath]] and its surrounding lands in [[the North]]. The title is traditionally held by a member of [[House Forrester]], and the current Lord is [[Rodrik Forrester]].
